text: Wild West Whoopee is a 1931 American western film directed by Robert J. Horner and starring Jack Perrin, Josephine Hill and Buzz Barton.Pitts p.171 ==Cast== * Jack Perrin * Josephine Hill * Buzz Barton * Fred Church * Horace B. Carpenter * John Ince * George Chesebro * Henry Roquemore * Ben Corbett * Charles Austin * Walter Patterson ==References== ==Bibliography== * Michael R. Pitts. Poverty Row Studios, 1929–1940: An Illustrated History of 55 Independent Film Companies, with a Filmography for Each. McFarland & Company, 2005. ==External links== * Category:1931 films Category:1931 Western (genre) films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:Films directed by Robert J. Horner
title: Wild West Whoopee
